mcqPracticeSet.title: Basic Communication Practice
mcqPracticeSet.description: Test your understanding of basic aviation communication with multiple choice questions

activities.prompt: What is the correct phraseology for requesting landing clearance?
activities.feedback: The correct phraseology is 'Request landing clearance'. This is the standard ICAO phraseology for requesting permission to land.

activities.prompt: Which frequency should you use for initial contact with ATC?
activities.feedback: 118.0 MHz is the standard frequency for initial contact with ATC in most regions.

audioPracticeSet.title: Pronunciation Practice
audioPracticeSet.description: Practice your pronunciation of aviation terminology

activities.prompt: Record yourself saying the following phrase: 'Request taxi clearance'
activities.feedback: Make sure to pronounce each word clearly and maintain a steady pace.

activities.prompt: Record yourself saying the following phrase: 'Maintaining flight level three five zero'

correctAnswer.text: Maintaining flight level three five zero

activities.feedback: Remember to use the word 'three' instead of 'thirty' when saying flight levels.

activities.prompt: Write the correct phrase for requesting a weather report:
activities.feedback: The standard phrase is 'Request weather information'. This is the correct ICAO phraseology.

activities.prompt: Write the correct phrase for reporting your position:
activities.feedback: The standard phrase is 'Position report'. This is the correct ICAO phraseology.
